definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger
person who represents an organization and enhances its image/ambassador
an ambassador of the church/an Apostolic Nuncio (from the Vatican)

sentences.english: Chinese Ambassador to Russia Li Hui also greeted Hu at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 中國駐俄羅斯大使李輝也到機場迎接。

sentences.english: The ambassador-designate will assume duty next month.
sentences.chinese: 這位派定的大使將在下個月就職。

sentences.english: H.E. Mr. Yang Youming, Chinese Ambassador to Trinidad and Tobago, and his wife Mrs. Geng Hailing were present.
sentences.chinese: 中國駐特多大使楊優明和夫人耿海凌出席。

sentences.english: Bin Laden daughter hides in Saudi embassy in Iran.
sentences.chinese: 拉登女兒擺脫伊朗軟禁，躲入沙特大使館。

sentences.english: Subsequent press reports named Bernard as the ambassador responsible.
sentences.chinese: 隨後更有媒體報道將矛頭直指貝納德大使。

sentences.english: The whole audience rose as the Chancellor and the Ambassador walked onto the rostrum and took their seats.
sentences.chinese: 全體聽衆起立，彭定康校長和劉大使走上主席臺落座。

sentences.english: The floor was splattered with blood, and the ambassador's eyeglasses lay a few feet from his body.
sentences.chinese: 鮮血濺了一地，大使的眼鏡掉在他屍體的不遠處。

sentences.english: You are Sulekha's China Ambassador. Good progress.
A large fete was given in honor of the ambassador.
sentences.chinese: 爲大使舉辦了一次盛大的遊園會。

sentences.english: The U. S. embassy, meanwhile, was in damage-control mode.
sentences.chinese: 美國大使館，同時，是在損害控制模式。

sentences.english: I am from Tianjin. Do I have to apply in Beijing?
sentences.chinese: 我是天津人，簽證一定要到北京大使館嗎？

sentences.english: It is a cabinet-level position with the rank of ambassador.
sentences.chinese: 這個是內閣級別的和大使級別一致。

sentences.english: Only two women hold ambassadorial rank.
sentences.chinese: 只有兩位婦女擔任大使。

sentences.english: Lord Mandelson extended warm welcome to Ambassador Liu for assuming his new post in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 曼德爾森勳爵熱烈歡迎劉大使來英履新。

sentences.english: Min'an Jie No. 16, Dongzhimen, Across from the Russian embassy.
sentences.chinese: 民安街16號，東直門，俄羅斯大使館對面。

sentences.english: Jean-Marie Lehn, French ambassador to China and winner of Nobel Prize for Chemistry delivered a speech.
sentences.chinese: 法國駐華大使和諾貝爾化學獎得主廉恩博士發表演講。

definition: person who represents an organization and enhances its image/ambassador
minister/diplomat performing ambassadorial role in Qing times, before regular diplomatic relations
to go and visit in an official capacity or for investigation
Foreign Secretary/(UK) Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
